locations.name: University College Dorm
locations.brief_description:
LOCATION: UNIVERSITY COLLEGE DORM

You’re in your cozy dorm at University College.

 You found a note from your roommate and realized that some water has spilled on it.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION: UNIVERSITY COLLEGE DORM

Your dorm at University College—your home base in the heart of campus. 
The walls hold memories of late-night cramming, last-minute assignments, and way too much procrastination. 
Scattered around the room are remnants of student life—books, clothes, empty coffee cups. 
As you scan the room, you may spot random objects lying around here and there. 
Hmm, looks like one of them might be a note!
Looking closer, you spot that some water has spilled on it.
What could it say?

locations.name: Dorm Desk
locations.long_description:
LOCATION: DORM DESK

Your desk is scattered with books, papers, and a few other belongings. 
Among the mess, an unattended phone rests silently, 
and a sticky note catches your attention—it definitely wasn’t there before.

locations.name: Dorm Cabinet
locations.long_description:
LOCATION: DORM CABINET

Your cabinet is slightly ajar, as if someone had rummaged through it. 
Inside, a few everyday essentials are neatly stacked, but one item stands out—a crumpled Starbucks receipt, 
left as if it had some significance.

locations.name: King’s College Circle
locations.brief_description:
LOCATION: KING’S COLLEGE CIRCLE

You step outside into King's College Circle, feeling the crisp air on your face.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION: KING’S COLLEGE CIRCLE

You step away from your studies and venture out to Front Campus, seeking a refreshing change of pace. 
To the east lies Robarts Commons, a hub of academic life. 
Heading south, you can retreat to the cozy warmth of your dorm in University College. 
To the west, the inviting gym at Hart House offers a chance to warm up and recharge.

locations.name: Robarts Commons
locations.brief_description:
LOCATION: ROBARTS COMMONS 1ST FLOOR

You are on the first floor of Robarts Commons. You have access to the first or second floor.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION: ROBARTS COMMONS 1ST FLOOR

You stand in the bustling lobby of Robarts Commons, the heart of student activity. 
Some students are heading up the stairs, searching for study spots, while others are heading out for a quick break. 
The elevators hum to your right, and behind you, the exit door opens to the busy St. George Street. 
You have plenty of options—time to decide where to head next.

locations.name: Robarts Commons (second floor)
locations.brief_description:
LOCATION: ROBARTS COMMONS 2ND FLOOR

You are on the second floor of Robarts Commons. 
A Starbucks cafe hums with activity beside you, while the common room beckons just a few steps away.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION: ROBARTS COMMONS 2ND FLOOR

You stand in the second floor buzzing with student life. 
To your right, the familiar aroma of freshly brewed coffee fills the air, as a queue of students waits eagerly at Starbucks. 
A mix of people stand in line: some buried in textbooks, some glued to their phones and others holding a...mug?

locations.name: Starbucks
locations.brief_description:
LOCATION: STARBUCKS

You’ve made it to your go-to spot—Starbucks for a quick caffeine fix.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION: STARBUCKS

The rich aroma of freshly brewed coffee fills the air, making it the ideal stop for a quick pick-me-up. 
It looks like Starbucks has rolled out a new eco-friendly policy: a 10% discount for bringing your own mug.

locations.name: Robarts Common Room
locations.brief_description:
LOCATION: ROBARTS COMMON ROOM

A large, well-lit study area on the second floor of Robarts Library, with private study rooms lining the edges.
A librarian sits at her desk, watching over the space.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION: ROBARTS COMMON ROOM

You step into the Robarts Common Room, a well-lit study space on the second floor of Robarts Library. 
Rows of study tables stretch across the room, occupied by students buried in textbooks and typing away on laptops. 
Several glass-walled study rooms line the perimeter, offering a quieter space for group work.

In front of you, a librarian sits on her desk, watching over the space.

locations.name: Hart House Fitness Centre
locations.brief_description:
LOCATION: HART HOUSE FITNESS CENTRE

You’re at Hart House Fitness Centre, your go-to place for working off stress.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION: HART HOUSE FITNESS CENTRE

You’re standing in the Hart House Fitness Centre, surrounded by the sound of weights clanging and the hum of the treadmill. 
It’s a familiar place—a spot where you’ve worked off both physical stress and mental blocks. 
You remember leaving something behind here during a previous workout session. 
Could it be the missing item you’re searching for?

locations.name: Bahen Centre
locations.brief_description:
LOCATION: BAHEN CENTRE

You’re on the first floor of Bahen Centre, a hub for engineering and computer science students. 
Here, you have access to the CSSU lounge and a Lost and Found.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION: BAHEN CENTRE

You’re on the first floor of Bahen Centre for Information Technology, the site of endless study sessions and stimulating lectures for engineering and computer science students. 
Around you, you find students rushing to finish assignments or cram for tests. 
In the corner of the room, you spot a “Lost and Found” door with a red sign. 
Right beside you, you spot a poster describing ‘All students are welcome to the CSSU lounge! Just right up the stairs!’

locations.name: CSSU Lounge
locations.brief_description:
LOCATION: CSSU LOUNGE

A quiet retreat for many CS students, offering a space to relax, collaborate, and recharge.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION: CSSU LOUNGE

A welcoming space where Computer Science students can connect with peers.
Around you, various objects catch your attention, and you spot a bunch of students sitting on a couch.

locations.name: Lost and Found
locations.brief_description:
LOCATION: LOST AND FOUND

You return to the red door, the familiar sign now catching your eye again: 'BYFFI QILFX'
locations.long_description:
LOCATION: LOST AND FOUND

You approach the crimson-red door, your gaze drawn to the weathered sign hanging crookedly.

The dim light flickers as you step closer, revealing the cryptic message: 'BYFFI QILFX.'

items.name: note
items.description:
Hey, sorry!! Had to grab your charger—total emergency, and you were dead asleep.
I’m at Robarts, room 2XXXXX.
Come find me when you're up! X - Roomie

items.name: phone
items.description:
Your phone buzzes with an unread message: 
‘Tsk Tsk Tsk, You left your T-Card again after the session. 
Looks like you owe me a run - Coach Carter’

items.name: starbucks receipt
items.description:
Order #7069
Thank you for your order!
Item: Caramel Macchiato
P.S. It’s Earth Week! Bring your own mug for a 10% discount.

items.name: lucky mug
items.description: Your Lucky Mug, a target item!

items.name: laptop charger
items.description: Your Laptop Charger, a target item!

items.name: usb drive
items.description: Your USB drive, a target item!
